D:\UE5.5-Compiled-Backup\UnrealEngine-5.5\Engine\Build\BatchFiles\RunUAT.bat BuildGraph ^
  -Script="F:\UNREAL\ATTEMPT2BECAUSEUNREALISASHITPROGRAM\FPSProject\BuildScripts\Build.xml" ^
  -Target=CI ^
  -set:ProjectName=FPSProject ^
  -set:ProjectRoot="F:\UNREAL\ATTEMPT2BECAUSEUNREALISASHITPROGRAM\FPSProject" ^
  -set:BuildConfiguration=Development ^
  -set:TargetPlatform=Win64 ^
  -set:EnableTests=true ^
  -set:EnablePackage=true ^
  -set:EnableLinting=true ^
  -set:AutomationTests="Game.FPSCharacter.Health"

Run anywhere to run XML




Engine\Build\BatchFiles\RunUAT.bat BuildGraph ^
  -Script=Engine/Build/InstalledEngineBuild.xml ^
  -Target="Make Installed Build Win64" ^
  -set:GameTargetPlatforms=Win64 ^
  -set:HostPlatformOnly=true ^
  -set:VSVersion=2022

RUN IN D:\UE5.5-Compiled-Backup\UnrealEngine-5.5 => Hopefully installs build
